message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you consider $90?  I'm really hoping to get this product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $105?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit higher than I'd like to go. How about $100? That's my final offer. I'm ready to buy right now if you're willing to accept it.
